hero.title: Software solutions that scale
hero.description: Virge.io delivers expert consulting and products across AI, Software Defined Networking, and eCommerce — helping businesses build resilient, future-proof technology.

home.aiDesc: Vector databases, RAG pipelines, and production-ready AI integrations that deliver real business value.
home.sdnDesc: Network automation with our Workflow Orchestrator (WFO) — infrastructure as code, done right.
home.ecomDesc: Headless content delivery and ShopVirge — spin up fully functional webshops in no time.
home.openclawDesc: Your own AI assistant — deployed, hosted, secured, and automated for your business.

cta.title: Ready to build something great?
cta.description: Let's discuss how Virge.io can help you scale your software solutions.

ai.title: AI Consulting
ai.description: We help you move beyond prototypes to production-ready AI systems that deliver measurable results.
ai.metaDesc: Practical, production-ready AI solutions — vector databases, RAG pipelines, and seamless integrations.
ai.searchDesc: Implement semantic search using state-of-the-art vector databases. Find meaning, not just keywords — enabling smarter retrieval across documents, products, and knowledge bases.
ai.ragDesc: Design and build Retrieval-Augmented Generation pipelines that ground LLM responses in your data. Reduce hallucinations and deliver accurate, context-aware answers.
ai.integrationDesc: Seamlessly embed AI capabilities into your current stack — from intelligent APIs to smart automation — without rebuilding from scratch.
ai.productionDesc: We focus on practical, scalable AI that works in the real world. Proper evaluation, monitoring, and iteration — not just demos.

sdn.title: Software Defined Networking
sdn.description: Automate and orchestrate your network infrastructure with battle-tested open-source tooling.
sdn.metaDesc: Network automation and orchestration with the Workflow Orchestrator (WFO) — proven in enterprise environments.
sdn.wfoDesc: The Workflow Orchestrator is an open-source platform for automating and orchestrating networks. It provides workflow and product modeling, standardised forms, and integrations with tools like Netbox and Ansible — giving you full control over your network lifecycle.
sdn.enterpriseDesc: We've delivered multiple WFO integration projects for large corporates and service providers. From initial architecture to production rollout — we know how to embed the Workflow Orchestrator into complex, existing environments.
sdn.modelingDesc: Define your network products and services as code. We help you model subscriptions, product types, and automated workflows that map directly to your business processes — reducing manual work and eliminating errors.
sdn.integrationsDesc: Connect the Workflow Orchestrator to your existing stack — Netbox for IPAM/DCIM, Ansible for device configuration via LSO, and custom APIs for your internal systems. We build the glue that makes it all work together.
sdn.iacDesc: Treat your network like software. Version-controlled configurations, repeatable deployments, and automated provisioning — bringing DevOps practices to network engineering.
sdn.trainingDesc: Get your team up to speed. We offer hands-on workshops covering WFO architecture, workflow development, and best practices for network automation at scale.

ecommerce.title: eCommerce
ecommerce.description: Modern, flexible eCommerce solutions — from headless content to turnkey webshops.
ecommerce.metaDesc: Headless content delivery, ShopVirge webshops, and eCommerce consultancy.
ecommerce.contentDesc: AI-powered product content generation for eCommerce. Just give us a product name — like "Selmer Mark VI" — and we deliver rich, high-quality descriptions, images, and metadata. Fully automated content enrichment that saves hours of manual work.
ecommerce.shopDesc: Our ad hoc webshop system lets you spin up fully functional online stores fast. Perfect for new brands, pop-up shops, or rapid market testing — without months of development.
ecommerce.consultancyDesc: Strategic advice on platform selection, architecture, payment integration, and scaling — helping you make the right technology choices for your business.
ecommerce.integrationsDesc: Connect your eCommerce stack with ERP, CRM, fulfillment, and marketing tools through robust API integrations.
ecommerce.contentLink: Learn more about Content as a Service →

openclaw.title: OpenClaw Consultancy
openclaw.description: Your own AI assistant that actually knows your business. We help you set it up, keep it running, and make it work for you.
openclaw.metaDesc: Run your own AI assistant — we help you deploy, host, secure, and automate with OpenClaw.
openclaw.deployDesc: Run OpenClaw on a VPS or Mac Mini — your data stays yours. We handle the full setup: installation, configuration, networking, and making sure everything talks to each other.
openclaw.hostingDesc: Don't want to manage infrastructure? We'll host your OpenClaw instance for you. Always up, always updated, zero hassle on your end.
openclaw.securityDesc: AI assistants handle sensitive data — we make sure yours is locked down. From firewall configuration to access controls and encrypted communications, we cover the full security stack.
openclaw.automationDesc: The real power of OpenClaw is automation. We help you connect it to your tools — email, calendar, CRM, messaging, databases — and build workflows that save hours every week.
openclaw.whatIsDesc: OpenClaw is an open-source AI assistant framework that runs on your own infrastructure. It connects to your messaging platforms, tools, and data — giving you a personal AI that understands your business context. Think of it as your always-on team member that never forgets, never sleeps, and gets smarter over time.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it.
contact.metaDesc: Get in touch with Virge.io — let's discuss your next project.

blog.description: Insights on AI, automation, and scaling technology for business.
blog.metaDesc: Insights on AI automation, RAG pipelines, and scaling Dutch tech companies internationally — from the Virge.io team.
